sect1.title: Pull and Fetch change
sect1.para: This section talk about how to Fetch or pull change from the other repository. The difference of Pull and fetch is:
Pull will merge remote branch change to local branch which tracked with remote branch. Fetch just get change from remote branch and never merge.
Other: Input Other URL or local directory You can click Browse to browse diectory.
If you checkAutoload Putty Key the check box, Putty key will auto load by pagaent.
Manage Remotes to add or modify remote configuration.
Git clone support http, git and ssh protocol. Show how to choose SSH client. OpenSSH, PLink or TortoisePlink.
